title: The plastic straw ban sucked. We still need regulations to save the ...
body: Plastic straw bans popped up across the country — in Washington, DC, on the first day of 2019; in Seattle in 2018; in a handful of Massachusetts towns starting as far back as 2015; statewide in...

Will you help keep Vox free?

Vox's journalism is free, so that everyone can understand our world. Reader support helps us do that. Will you give today?

The straw ban was both dopey and harmful in practice. We need (better) legislation like it. Sarah Lawrence for Vox.

FILED UNDER: MONEY

We were all right to hate the plastic straw ban. And we need more legislation like it.

**In 2019, we got good and mad about straws.**
By Meredith Haggerty@manymanywords Dec 27, 2019, 7:00am EST

summary: The post discusses the negative impact and impracticality of the straw ban while advocating for better legislation. It reflects a critical view of the straw ban and the need for more effective measures. Sentiment: 0.3
